author: WINSTON ROGERS | WJLA
title: chevron-right
text: {p}With the D.C. area receiving several inches of snow on the ground the last few days, a social media group made the best of it once again with a fun tradition.{/p}{p}{a href=\"washington-dc-national-gallery-air-space-museum-smithsonian-association-winter-weather-dmv-capitol-first-since-2021-tradition-family-friendly-all-ages-even\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"washington-dc-national-gallery-air-space-museum-smithsonian-association-winter-weather-dmv-capitol-first-since-2021-tradition-family-friendly-all-ages-even\"}A last-minute snowball fight{/a} took place Tuesday morning on the grass between the National Gallery and the Air & Space Museum. It was hosted by the {a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/DCSFA\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://www.facebook.com/DCSFA\"}Washington D.C. Snowball Fight Association{/a}.{/p}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"%3Ciframe%20src=%22https://www.facebook.com/plugins/video.php?href=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.facebook.com%252F7NewsDC%252Fvideos%252F899484001478926%252F%253Fref%253Dembed_video&show_text=0&width=560%22%20width=%22560%22%20height=%22315%22%20style=%22border:none;overflow:hidden%22%20scrolling=%22no%22%20frameborder=%220%22%20allowfullscreen=%22true%22%20allow=%22autoplay;%20clipboard-write;%20encrypted-media;%20picture-in-picture;%20web-share%22%20allowFullScreen=%22true%22%3E%3C/iframe%3E\" data-embed-type=\"facebook\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Dubbed the Battle of Snowpenheimer, it's the 16th such snowball fight planned by the group since 2010. The last one was held at the Smithsonian Castle in 2021, with other similar events previously held at the Washington Monument and Dupont Circle.{br}{/p}{blockquote}DC Snowballers! With the National Weather Service issuing a last minute Winter Storm Warning, we're throwing a last-minute snowball fight on the National Mall on Tuesday morning, starting at 8:30 a.m.,\" according to the post on Facebook.{/blockquote}{p}{sd-embed class=\"sd-embedded-media\" data-embed-file=\"1747131143600713840\" data-embed-type=\"twitter\" contenteditable=\"false\"}{/sd-embed}{/p}{p}Previous public turnout for the event has been huge and well-documented.{br}
